subject: To Whom It May Concern:
body:
To Whom It May Concern:
My name is Edward Stevenson. I am a Certified Outsourcing Specialist {COS} based in the Republic of Ghana. By virtue of my profession, I have my clientâ€™s mandate to source for Investment/Fund Manager or Entrepreneur with wealth of experience from any part of the World  that will be willing and ready to manage my client's  Investment Capital for a long period of 10 years and above without interference from the ultimate beneficial owner either directly or indirectly.
Furthermore, you shall retain 10% of the Investment Capital as your Gratification, Commission and Investment Management Fees should you find this offer interesting. In addition, you will at the same time retain 30% Net Profit from the client's Investment Capital for managing the Investment satisfactorily.
The Return on Investment {ROI} payable annually to my client will be determined by you and finally, you will have a Grace Period of 18 months before ROI will be paid to my client annually. If you are eminently qualified to work with us as specified herein, kindly introduce yourself, your company and what type of business you  do in order to assess your qualifications. More so, add your WhatSapp Number for more effective communication.
Truly Yours,
Edward Stevenson,CSO

subject: Re:   To Whom It May Concern:
body:
Hello Edward,

It's a pleasure to meet you. Your proposal sounds quite interesting, and I'm intrigued by the opportunity. However, I would like to understand more about it before making any commitments.

Could you please provide more details about your client? What kind of business are they in? And what type of investment are they looking to make?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "you shall retain of the Investment Capital as your Commission"? It seems like there might be a number missing there.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Albert
